scripts.android:run:
npm run android:build && expo run:android -d && echo '
Android (Development) run successfully!'
scripts.android:build:
expo prebuild --platform android --clean && echo '
Android (Development) native folder build completed successfully!'
scripts.android:apk:
npm run android:build && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && echo '
Android (Development) APK built and installed successfully!' && open app/build/outputs/apk/release
scripts.ios:run:
npm run ios:build && expo run:ios -d && echo '
iOS (Development) run successfully!'
scripts.ios:build:
expo prebuild --platform ios && npx pod-install && echo '
iOS (Development) native folder build completed successfully!'
scripts.ios:ipa:
npm run ios:build && cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace Treats.xcworkspace -scheme Treats -archivePath build/Treats.xcarchive archive && xcodebuild -exportArchive -archivePath build/Treats.xcarchive -exportPath build -exportOptionsPlist ExportOptions.plist && echo '
iOS (Development) IPA built successfully!' && open build
